DOC.brief_summary: This prospective annual release study design evaluate safety 3 new influenza virus vaccine strain include FluMist Quadrivalent 2015-2016 influenza season
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety 3 New 6:2 Influenza Virus Reassortants Adults 2015-2016 Season
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled release study enroll approximately 300 healthy adult 18 49 year age . Eligible participant randomly assign 4:1 fashion receive single dose trivalent vaccine placebo intranasal spray . Randomization stratify site . This study conduct 3 site United States America . Each participant receive 1 dose investigational product Day 1 . The duration study participation participant time study vaccination 181 day study vaccination .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 49 year Written inform consent Participant available telephone Ability understand comply requirement protocol , judge Investigator Concurrent enrollment another clinical study 180 day receipt investigational product ( Day 181 ) History hypersensitivity component vaccine , include egg egg protein serious , life threatening , severe reaction previous influenza vaccination Any condition inactivate influenza vaccine indicate , include chronic disorder pulmonary cardiovascular system ( example [ eg ] , asthma ) , chronic metabolic disease ( eg , diabetes mellitus ) , renal dysfunction , hemoglobinopathy require regular medical followup hospitalization precede year Acute febrile ( great [ > ] 100.0 degree Fahrenheit [ F ] oral equivalent ) and/or clinically significant respiratory illness ( example , cough sore throat ) within 14 day prior randomization Any known immunosuppressive condition immune deficiency disease , include human immunodeficiency virus infection , ongoing immunosuppressive therapy History GuillainBarr√© syndrome
